item.title: Bummer, back to Photoshop
item.description: I bought Photoshop Elements 4 a while ago, but didn't use it much since I didn't like the userinterface (dissapearing menus when you click on the desktop and such). Then came Lightroom public beta, the Photoshop killer. I haven't touched Photoshop since I installed Lightroom. But now... the Lightroom beta testing period is over. Since I haven't got 300 Euros to "splurge" on Lightroom, I guess I'm forced to learn to use Photoshop to process my photos now. Oh well... Let's see how that goes.
